elements.desc:
Fired when the slider's value changes due to user interaction.

Changes to the slider's value due to changes in an underlying
bound variable will not trigger this event.

events.desc:
Fired when the slider's value changes due to user interaction.

Changes to the slider's value due to changes in an underlying
bound variable will not trigger this event.

jsdoc.description:
Fired when the slider's value changes due to user interaction.

Changes to the slider's value due to changes in an underlying
bound variable will not trigger this event.
jsdoc.orig:
*
   * Fired when the slider's value changes due to user interaction.
   *
   * Changes to the slider's value due to changes in an underlying
   * bound variable will not trigger this event.
   *
   * @event change

events.name: change

events.desc: Fired when the slider's immediateValue changes.

jsdoc.description: Fired when the slider's immediateValue changes.
jsdoc.orig:
*
   * Fired when the slider's immediateValue changes.
   *
   * @event immediate-value-change

events.name: immediate-value-change

events.desc: Fired when the slider's value changes.

jsdoc.description: Fired when the slider's value changes.
jsdoc.orig:
*
   * Fired when the slider's value changes.
   *
   * @event value-change

events.name: value-change

properties.name: decrement
properties.desc: Decreases value by `step` but not below `min`.

properties.name: dragging
properties.desc: True when the user is dragging the slider.

properties.name: editable
properties.desc: If true, an input is shown and user can use it to set the slider value.

properties.name: expand
properties.desc: If true, the knob is expanded

properties.name: immediateValue
properties.desc:
The immediate value of the slider.  This value is updated while the user
is dragging the slider.

properties.name: increment
properties.desc: Increases value by `step` but not above `max`.

properties.name: maxMarkers
properties.desc: The maximum number of markers

properties.name: pin
properties.desc:
If true, a pin with numeric value label is shown when the slider thumb
is pressed. Use for settings for which users need to know the exact
value of the setting.

properties.name: secondaryProgress
properties.desc: The number that represents the current secondary progress.

properties.name: snaps
properties.desc:
If true, the slider thumb snaps to tick marks evenly spaced based
on the `step` property value.

paper-slider.desc:

Changes to the slider's value due to changes in an underlying
bound variable will not trigger this event.
